alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:28PM EDT until June 25 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Putnam County in west central Ohio... Van Wert County in west central Ohio... Southwestern Allen County in west central Ohio... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 927 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ohio City, or near Van Wert, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Delphos, Spencerville, Convoy, Ottoville, Ohio City, Spencerville In Allen County, Middlebury, Middle Point, Fort Jennings, Willshire, Wren, Venedocia, Elgin, Rushmore, Cavett, Dull, Jonestown, Schumm and Wetzel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
